MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the KA6 postcode area of Ayr. This is causing reduced power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5pm. Our engineers have arrived on site and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:43 PM on Saturday, 28 November 2020.
